---

title: 3 - Problem Solving
desc: ''
updated: 1727220146355
created: 1727217448480
---

This **involves** `identifying` `the root causes of` `issues` `and working together` **with others** `to generate` `practical and effective` `solutions`. `Collaboration` `is key`, `encouraging` `open communication and input` `from all parties` **involved** `to resolve` `disagreements or conflicts` `in a productive manner`. **Key steps** include:



<!-- start of 'collaboration' section -->
<details>
    <summary>Definition: collaboration</summary>

#
Collaboration **is** `working together` `with others` `to achieve` `a common goal` `or complete a task`, `by sharing` `ideas`, `skills`, **and** `responsibilities`.

---
</details>
<!-- end of 'collaboration' section -->



- **Defining the Problem**: `Clearly` `articulate` `the issue`, `ensuring` `all parties` `understand` `the nature and scope of` `the conflict`.



<!-- start of 'articulate' section -->
<details>
    <summary>Definition: articulate</summary>

#
Articulate **means** `to express` `thoughts`, `ideas`, **or** `feelings` `clearly and effectively`, `using` `words`.

---
</details>
<!-- end of 'articulate' section -->



<!-- start of 'scope' section -->
<details>
    <summary>Definition: scope</summary>

#
Scope **refers to** `the range or extent of` `something`, `including` `what is included` `and what is excluded`, **such as** `the boundaries of` `a project or task`.

---
</details>
<!-- end of 'scope' section -->



- **Gathering Perspectives**: `Encourage` `everyone` **involved** `to share` `their viewpoints`, `experiences`, **and** `potential solutions`.

- **Brainstorming Solutions**: `Work collaboratively` `to generate` `multiple solutions`, `fostering` `creativity and inclusivity`.



<!-- start of 'inclusivity' section -->
<details>
    <summary>Definition: inclusivity</summary>

#
Inclusivity **is** `the practice of` `ensuring` `that everyone is` `welcomed`, `valued`, `and given` `equal opportunities`, `regardless of` **their** `background or identity`.

---
</details>
<!-- end of 'inclusivity' section -->



- **Evaluating Options**: `Assess` **the** `pros and cons of` `each` `potential solution`, `considering` `fairness and practicality`.



<!-- start of 'practicality' section -->
<details>
    <summary>Definition: practicality</summary>

#
Practicality **refers to** `the quality of` `being` `sensible`, `realistic`, `and effective in` `dealing with` `real-life` `situations or problems`.

---
</details>
<!-- end of 'practicality' section -->



- **Implementing a Plan**: `Choose` `a solution` `and agree on` `steps` `to execute it`, `ensuring` `all parties` `are committed to` `the resolution`.

- **Monitoring the Outcome**: `After implementation`, `monitor` `the results` `to ensure` `the conflict` `has been resolved` `and make adjustments` `if necessary`.
